textos_fuente.text: Supporting The Bahamas - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Supporting The Bahamas Posted on September 19, 2019 September 20, 2019 Join us on Tuesday, September 24, 2019 from 6:30pm to 9pm as we come together to raise money for those devastated by Hurricane Dorian in the Bahamas. Live & Silent Auctions | Exclusive Commemorative Hat & T-Shirts | 50/50 Raffle | Direct Donations – Benefiting IGFA World Anglers Relief Fund (WARF) and the American Red Cross Bahamas. Bahamas Strong Fundraiser Anywhere in the world, on any day, at any time, a thriving recreational fishery can become a wasteland in a matter of hours in a major national disaster.  The captains, guides, crews and outfitters who depend on recreational fishing for their livelihoods often find themselves in the center of the storm. The Flagler Tavern has joined efforts with the International Game Fish Association (IGFA) and Costa Sunglasses to support our brothers and sisters in the Bahamas in the wake of Hurricane Dorian by donating to the IGFA Worldwide Anglers Relief Fund and The American Red Cross Bahamas Fund. How can you help? Donate! If you would like to donate an auction item, please contact us at manager@flaglertavern.com or call us at 386-402-8861.  We would love to include your donated item in our live or silent auctions. Bid!  Join us at The Flagler Tavern at the Main Stage on Tuesday 9/24 from 6:30pm to 9pm and bid with your heart on the many donated auction items we have waiting for you.  We have already started collecting donation and we have a great selection at every price level, from $25 gift cards to a Billfishing Trip of a Lifetime – Casa Vieja Fishing Lodge, Pacific Coast of Guatemala for 2 Anglers with Accommodations valued at over $5,000 and so much more!  100% of the money raised will be split between the IGFA WARF and The American Red Cross Bahamas. Limited Edition Costa & Flagler Tavern #OneCoast Shirt Purchase!  Purchase an exclusive Costa & Flagler Tavern #OneCoast – Bahamas Strong T-shirt or Hat.  100% of the money raised will go IGFA WARF and The American Red Cross Bahamas, thanks to generous donations from Costa, Flagler Tavern, Tropical Design & Shok Idea Group.  Available for pre-purchase now at www.flaglertavern.com/shop Limited Edition Costa & Flagler Tavern @OneCoast Hat As we here in New Smyrna Beach, breath a sigh of relief that Hurricane Dorian thankfully passed us by, let us remember our neighbors who where unfortunately not so lucky. https://www.facebook.com/events/496183661195211/ Share on: « Back Join Our Newsletter Connect With Us Loyalty Program Login | Learn More Contact us 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 Open Today (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com ©2025 Flagler Tavern. All Rights Reserved. Terms of Use , Privacy Policy , and Accessibility Statement Site by Shok Idea Group

Father's Day 2024 Chef's Dinner - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Flagler Tavern Merchandise Father’s Day 2024 Chef’s Dinner $ 59.95 TICKETS FOR FATHER’S DAY DINNER ARE NO LONGER AVAILABLE ONLINE. PLEASE CONTACT OUR HOSTESS DESK FOR AVAILABILITY 386-402-8861, EXT 1 Raise a Glass and Celebrate Dad this Father’s Day at The Bounty Sunday, June 16, 2024 – The Bounty Doors Open 5pm | Sampling 5:30pm | Dinner 6:30pm Uncork a memorable evening and toast to Dad at The Bounty, Flagler Tavern’s charming speakeasy. This Father’s Day, celebrate with a curated pre-fixe menu complemented by a selection of fine bourbons and craft beers, available for an additional charge. On Sunday, June 16th, indulge in a delectable multi-course feast featuring a complimentary amuse bouche, followed by a selection of enticing main courses. 1st Course: Sizzling Carne Asada Street Tacos Savory marinated skirt steak with a touch of heat, accompanied by blistered jalapeno guacamole, torched queso fresco, and tomatillo salsa verde. 2nd Course: 1928 Wedge Salad A classic wedge salad with iceberg lettuce, crisp pork belly, Point Reyes blue cheese, heirloom tomatoes, charred onion, and a touch of balsamic glaze. 3rd Course: Sweet & Smoky Scallops Seared scallops served on a bed of sweet corn puree, accented with applewood smoked bacon, chives, and creamy burrata. 4th Course: St. Louis-Style Ribs Succulent ribs glazed with our signature habanero peach honey BBQ, served with hand-cut steak fries, a refreshing pickled slaw, and a decadent Vermont white cheddar mac and cheese. 5th Course: Salted Caramel Panna Cotta with Praline Crumble A delightful end to the evening, featuring a smooth panna cotta with a touch of caramel and a crunchy praline topping. $59.95 per person *Plus Gratuity & Florida Sales Tax Limited to 50 seats This ticket includes ticket price $59.95 plus 20% gratuity ($11.99). You will be charged $71.94 plus Florida Sales Tax. Ticket includes dinner for one (1) person.  Bourbon and/or Beer Sampling available for a supplemental charge. Please purchase all tickets for the same table at the same time or let us know in order notes if you wish to be seated with another group.   **Unfortunately, substitutions or special meal requests cannot be accommodated. Our online order system accepts Visa or Mastercard only. Out of stock SKU: SE06182023-1-1 Categories: 20% Gratuity , Special Event Tags: Bourbon Dinner , Chef Dinner , Father's Day , Flagler Ave , Flagler Avenue , Flagler Tavern , NEW SMYRNA , New Smyrna Beach , The Bounty You may also like… Gift Card $ 25.00 – $ 100.00 Price range: $25.00 through $100.00 This product has multiple variants. The options may be chosen on the product page Related products Flagler Tavern 2024 Koozies $ 7.00 This product has multiple variants. About - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Making Memories Since 1928 Great Food • Cold Drinks • Live Music Great Food ​Flagler Tavern is unique in that we offer a full menu of premium quality food any time of day or night. Our award winning culinary team creates delicious entrees using only the finest of ingredients - fresh wild-caught seafood, hormone & antibiotic-free chicken, artisan breads, and Florida-raised beef. Choose from delectable salads, asian-inspired entrees, American favorites, indulgent pasta, and the freshest of seafood. We offer gluten-free options as well. No matter what you’re in the mood for - you’ll find it on our menu!  The best part is that it’s all cheerfully served by our Flagler Tavern family of employees (most of which have been a part of our team for years). Drop by for lunch or dinner any day of the week, or check out our brunch menu saturday & sunday mornings from 10am to 1pm. View Menu Cold Drinks ​Come check out the new upgraded wine list at our Bounty Bar! We are extremely proud to offer ALL 90+ point vintages at an amazing value. Or, if you are in the mood for a beer - we have over 30 drafts to choose from! With a full line of frozen creations, like the delicious “Chocolate Monkey” - Cruzan vanilla rum and Kahlua blended with vanilla ice cream & banana puree, topped with chocolate. With hand-crafted cocktails, unique specialty margaritas and an assortment of flavorful mules, the Flagler Tavern has something for everyone. The exclusive cocktail menu at our upstairs Bounty Bar features premium made-from-scratch creations, including our famous ‘smoked maple old fashioned.’ Choose from a distinctive selection of liquors and homemade infusions that you won’t find anywhere else. Specialty Cocktails Live Music ​Flagler Tavern is proud to present a diverse lineup of musical talents including local acoustic solo & duo acts, nationally touring groups, and even a resident four-time grammy winner - with full live bands on the weekends. Performances are every evening from 5pm to 8pm, and all day saturday and sunday. Enjoy a delicious brunch or lunch while listening to eclectic musical performances on our outside deck. We adapt our live entertainment schedule to the NFL football season, as not to coincide with game broadcasts - so be sure to check our entertainment schedule for updates View Calendar Bar Areas Each area has a different vibe, so belly-up and wind-down Tavern Main Bar Indigo at Flager Tavern The Outside Decks The Bounty Speakeasy Join Our Newsletter Connect With Us Loyalty Program Login | Learn More Contact us 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 Open Today (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com ©2025 Flagler Tavern. All Rights Reserved. Terms of Use , Privacy Policy , and Accessibility Statement Site by Shok Idea Group

Loyalty Program - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Loyalty Program Anchor Club Login Login to your account to manage your rewards Login Loyalty Program FAQs WHAT IS THE FLAGLER TAVERN LOYALTY PROGRAM? The Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program was designed to thank our wonderful guests (like you!). Rewards members receive points for Restaurant transactions by presenting your loyalty card when your pay bill. Once a guest earns 150 points, these points will be automatically turned into a $10 reward. HOW DO I JOIN THE FLAGLER TAVERN LOYALTY PROGRAM? If you do not already have a loyalty card, visit Flagler Tavern in person at 414 Flagler Avenue, New Smyrna Beach 32169 and request a FREE loyalty card. Once you receive your card, register your card online at FlaglerTavern.com/loyalty/ . As a bonus, you will earn you 25 bonus points AND a free gift just for joining the program. WHAT PURCHASES QUALIFY FOR REWARDS? Restaurant purchases for food, retail merchandise and all beverages will be credited points at a rate of 1 point for every $1 dollar spent. Points will not be issued for discounts, certain excluded promotions, tax or tip. From time to time we may offer special rewards or frequent buyer bonuses. HOW DO I EARN POINTS? Your server will provide you with your check at the end of your meal. Prior to paying for this check, please present your loyalty card to your server. Your points will automatically be credited to your loyalty account. WHAT IF I FORGET TO PRESENT MY LOYALTY CARD WHEN I PAY MY CHECK? We now offer the option to scan the QR Code at the bottom of your check to receive credit for your visit OR you can submit a copy of your receipt along with your name, check number and loyalty account number to submit your check number for points. Please note manual check submission courtesy is only extended 3 times per guest, per year. HOW DO I FIND MY CHECK NUMBER? Your dining check number is a 5-digit code that is located near the top left side of your check. Should you need further assistance, your server or bartender can help you locate your dining check number. CAN I APPLY MULTIPLE CHECKS TO MY ACCOUNT? There is a limit of 3 checks per day, per guest and up to 500 points within a 24 hours period. HOW DO I EARN POINTS FOR MY PURCHASES AT FLAGLER TAVERN? It is easy to earn points for your Flagler Tavern purchases. Simply provide your server/bartender with your loyalty card and they will be happy to submit the check number on your behalf, or you can scan the QR Code at the bottom of your check and add them immediately. You will earn 1 point for every $1 spent at Flagler Tavern on food, retail merchandise and all beverages. Tax and gratuity are not included. HOW DO I REDEEM MY REWARDS AT FLAGLER TAVERN? Rewards, gifts, and offers will automatically appear on your account accessibile through our web based customer portal or your wallet pass. To use your rewards, gifts or offers, simply let your server know before your check is closed out. WHAT IF I FORGOT TO REDEEM MY REWARD? Your rewards can be redeemed on any visit within two (2) years after you earn them. Simply let your server know on your next visit you would like to use your rewards. HOW DO I CHECK MY REWARD BALANCE? Simply visit FlaglerTavern.com/loyalty/ and enter your phone number to check your rewards balance.  Please note that rewards earned are credited to your online balance the following business day. WHAT IF AN ORDER IS $10.75? DO I GET 10 POINTS OR 11? 11 points. Transactions are rounded to the nearest dollar amount from $.50. IF I HAVE 75 POINTS, CAN I GET A $5 REWARD? No, rewards are earned in $10 increments. You must reach 150 points before you get a reward. CAN I HAVE MORE THAN ONE LOYALTY CARD? No. Only one active membership per person at a time is allowed. The Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program is intended for individual use only and require a unique phone number. You may have more than one card per household, so long as each card has a unique phone number. HOW OLD DO I NEED TO BE IN ORDER TO PARTICIPATE IN THE FLAGLER TAVERN LOYALTY PROGRAM? You must be at least 18 years old to participate. By signing up for the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program you are acknowledging that you are eligible to participate in this program. HOW DO I OPT OUT OF THE FLAGLER TAVERN LOYALTY PROGRAM? Simply send an email to support@flaglertavern.com with your name, Loyalty Card Number, and phone number, and request to cancel to stop participating in the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program. Cancellation of this program will void all rewards and points previously earned. CAN I EARN POINTS AND REDEEM REWARDS ON ONLINE ORDERS? No, Points cannot be earned or redeemed on online orders at this time. DOES IT COST ANYTHING TO BECOME A FLAGLER TAVERN LOYALTY MEMBER? Flagler Tavern Loyalty program is free to join. WHEN CAN I START EARNING POINTS? You can start earning points right away! Simply visit Flagler Tavern today and ask your server/bartender for a Loyalty Card then visit FlaglerTavern.com/loyalty/ and sign up by entering your information and Loyalty card number to start earning points. CAN I EARN POINTS ON GIFT CARD PURCHASES? No, points will not be earned for the purchase of gift cards. However, if the recipient of the gift card is an active Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member, points will be issued upon the gift card redemption. WILL I EARN POINTS WHEN I USED MY REWARDS TO PAY FOR MY PURCHASE Points will be rewarded for qualifying purchases of the full check amount after any rewards or promotions have been deducted from the check. For example, if your total is $15 and you redeem a $10 reward, you will earn 5 points. CAN I REDEEM A $10 REWARD FOR AN ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGE? Yes, $10 rewards may be redeemed on your next visit for any purchase of food, retail merchandise and non-alcoholic and alcoholic beverages. DO MY REWARDS OR OFFERS EXPIRE? $10 rewards expire two (2) years after the date they were earned. Special offers suh as birthday or anniversary gifts will expire after the calendar month they are earned. I CAN'T FIND THE ANSWER TO MY QUESTION ON THIS PAGE. WHO DO I CONTACT? We're here to help! Email us at support@FlaglerTavern.com. TERMS & CONDITIONS View our loyalty program terms & conditions. Join Our Newsletter Connect With Us Loyalty Program Login | Learn More Contact us 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 Open Today (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com ©2025 Flagler Tavern. All Rights Reserved. Terms of Use , Privacy Policy , and Accessibility Statement Site by Shok Idea Group

Terms & Conditions - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program Terms and Conditions 1. The Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program is a Flagler Tavern program that rewards our guests with points for their purchases. Reward members receive points for qualifying restaurant transactions by presenting your Loyalty Card and time of payment. Once a guest earns 150 points, these points will be redeemed for a $10 reward. Members also receive special offers. 2. You must be eighteen (18) years or older to become a Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member. 3. Purchase is not necessary to get a Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program membership. Simply stop by Flagler Tavern at any time and request a card, then visit FlaglerTavern.com and sign up. As a bonus, you will earn 25 bonus points just for joining the program. 4. Only one active membership per person at a time is allowed. The Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program is intended for individual use only. 5. You must provide us with a valid email address and mobile number to qualify. 6. Upon becoming a Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member, eligible guests are subject to these Terms & Condition. 7. Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program points are available on qualifying purchases at our Flagler Tavern location only. Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program rewards can be applied to qualifying purchases at our Flagler Tavern location only. Points are credited to your account when providing your Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program information to the designated recipient, which may be your server, manager or to the program website at flaglertavern.com 8. Points will not be issued for the purchase of gift cards, rewards, discounts, promotions, tax or tip. 9. Points are awarded only to the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member who pays the check. Points will not be issued for the purchase of gift cards. However, if the recipient is an active Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member, points will be issued when the member uses the gift card on qualifying purchases at our Flagler Tavern location. 10. Flagler Tavern reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to terminate the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program, and to amend, limit, modify or add to the terms and conditions, including but not limited to imposing time limits and changes in point values, rewards and reward levels, all without prior notice, at any time. 11. Except where required by law, points have no cash value and are surrendered for award redemption only. 12. To qualify for points on a catered event or banquet function, you must be an active Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program prior to booking the event and the member must be the individual paying for the event. Points will not be issued for room rental or service charges. Limit 500 points per event or banquet function. 13. Flagler Tavern may engage in periodic audits of a member’s account. Flagler Tavern reserves the right to discontinue membership privileges and/or void all or a portion of a member’s point balance if the points have been issued, received or redeemed through computer error, fraud or theft, through illegal means or in a manner not authorized by the Terms and Conditions or in other legal or equitable remedy which may be available for the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program under applicable law. 14. Accumulated points are not member property and may be revoked, canceled, limited or modified at any time, even though such action may affect a member’s right to previously accumulated points. 15. Flagler Tavern will not disclose the information that you provide in connection with your membership in the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program to anyone else but may use your information and other members’ information internally and externally as part of its marketing research. 16. By Joining the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program you agree to OPT-IN to receive periodic email or SMS text communication about the status of your Loyalty Program Rewards, changes in Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program Benefits, Rewards and Terms and Conditions. You also agree to OPT-IN to receive the Flagler Tavern Weekly Email Newsletter which may contain updates and special reward offers for Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program Members. 17. Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program points and rewards are not transferable. Federal and state tax liabilities are the sole responsibility of the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program member. 18. Flagler Tavern employees are not eligible to participate in the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program. 19. Flagler Tavern is not responsible for points or awards lost due to fraudulent or unauthorized use, including fraud caused by lost or stolen membership including any loss of points or awards as a result of a lost or stolen membership. Flagler Tavern and each of its affiliates are not responsible for any negligence, claims, liability, injury, property loss or other damage of members or other third parties arising from or in connection with the use/misuse of rewards and/or participation in the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program. 20. The Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program is subject to applicable state, federal and local laws and regulations. 21. These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by, subject to, and construed in accordance with the laws of state of Florida, United States of America, excluding all conflict of law rules. If any provision(s) of these Terms and Conditions are held to be invalid or unenforceable, all remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect. To the extent permitted by law, the right to litigate, seek injunctive relief or make any other recourse to judicial or any other procedure in case of disputes or claims resulting from or in connection with the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program are hereby excluded, and all members expressly waive any and all such rights. 22. By becoming a member of the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program, you agree that exclusive jurisdiction for any dispute, claim, or demand related in any way to the Flagler Tavern Loyalty Program will be decided by binding arbitration. All disputes between you and Flagler Tavern and/or its affiliates of whatsoever kind or nature arising out of these Terms and Conditions shall be submitted to judicial arbitration under its rules then in effect in the Florida, USA area before one (1) arbitrator to be mutually agreed upon by both parties. The parties agree to share equally in the arbitration costs incurred. Private Events - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Let us host your next event or private party! Flagler Tavern has ample space available for your corporate event, holiday party, wedding celebration, bridal shower, baby shower, birthday party, or other special event! Our staff will coordinate and cater your entire event, start to finish, based on your budget. From fully plated black tie events to a casual buffet of delicious hors d'oeuvres and cocktails, we can put together the perfect all-inclusive package for your event. To book your date please fill out our private events form and a member of our event planning staff will contact you. Flagler Tavern Main Restaurant: ​Downstairs area with high top seating and plenty of room for big parties! Front and back rooms can be reserved, and our flexible event coordinating team can close off sections of the restaurant to allow for a fully private event. Learn More Indigo at Flagler Tavern: ​Immerse yourself in the cool blue vibe of the Indigo Bar, the central hub of the Flagler Tavern. Relax during the day, indulge in swanky happy hour cocktails, or enjoy vibrant weekend nightlife. Just steps from our outdoor decks, this intimate bar offers the perfect atmosphere for any mood. Tropical fish and jellyfish enhance the fun, lighthearted energy. Open for dining or drinks throughout the day and late into the evening, the Indigo Bar is the perfect spot to unwind and connect with friends. Learn More Downstairs Deck: ​Our outdoor front and side decks are covered from the elements but offer a wonderful ocean breeze and a view of picturesque flagler avenue. Plenty of room for big parties. Learn More Bounty Bar & Upstairs Deck: ​The upstairs bounty bar is themed in a speakeasy style, offering a more intimate setting for guests. This area provides limited table height seating inside and on the uncovered portion of the outdoor deck, along with additional bar height seating under the deck’s covered areas. Though this area is on the second level of the Flagler Tavern, it is fully handicap accessible. Tis the Season... - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Tis the Season… Posted on October 19, 2018 It’s that time of year where we start making our holiday plans and look forward to gatherings with friends and family.  For some of us, like myself, visions of childhood Christmas’ color my vision of what the “holidays” should be.  I long for smell of my grandmother’s dry turkey and burnt Parker House dinner rolls, sitting sandwiched in between great aunts and uncles listening to stories of relatives and wars long past and sneaking a sip of Cold Duck from Aunt Dot’s glass. Alas those days are long gone, but surely not forgotten.  And like many of us, separated from our family by distance, we have created our own “families” through friends and work-mates, forging new traditions and memories.  Over the years I’ve learned in my zeal to try to recreate my family holiday dinners, what a huge amount of stress and work it was.  Shopping, prepping, getting up at the crack of dawn to get the turkey in the oven, breaking out the family china, cleaning the house, decorating…OH MY, I’m tired just thinking about it.  And of course, by the time you set the food on the table being so tired (and full) that you can barely enjoy the conversation, the friends the family you so fervently want to connect with and make happy. Maybe you are one of those super women (or men) that can make it all look easy.  I never have been.  My closest friends can see it on my face.  I try to make it look easy, but I just look stressed.  I often marvel at my grandmother’s ability to get it all done!  So what does my failure as a modern day Martha Stewart have to do with Flagler Tavern?  Well just this, through a Lemony Snicket series of events the road of my life finds me coordinating events at Flagler Tavern.  This is a dream job of sorts for me, being able to help our guests create life-long memories for their weddings, rehearsal dinner and holiday parties and more, with a crew of talented chefs, servers, bartenders and event staff that can do, as a team, what I could never do on my own.  Now this for me, is something magical!  I can’t tell you the immense satisfaction it brings to be able to take some of that, all to familiar stress, away from our guests on their important day so they can enjoy their friends and family and relax knowing we are taking good care of them.  That to me is everything! So this holiday season, if you are starting to feel the pressures of hosting the perfect holiday party or just want to for once, sit back and enjoy your friends and family and let someone else do all the work, we’ve got you!  From ugly sweater parties to formal seated dinners; from causal to fancy we can help you create a warm and wonderful, truly unique holiday party for your family, friends or work-mates that is stress-free.   Let us help you plan your holiday party this year.  Trust me, you may never defrost a turkey again! —Food for Thought— Elaine Share on: « Back Join Our Newsletter Connect With Us Loyalty Program Login | Learn More Contact us 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 Open Today (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com ©2025 Flagler Tavern. Thanksgiving Dinner - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Thanksgiving Dinner Posted on November 18, 2020 November 18, 2020 One of our favorite seasons and time of the year is upon us, and we have great options for you and your family this Thanksgiving! We welcome you to dine in, or order your meal to go available for curbside pickup or delivery within the area! Plus, we’ll offer a Heat and Serve Family Meal also available for take out or delivery! November also brings the annual NSB Chili Cookoff and a Wine Walk! Read on for all the details! We want to take a moment to express our sincere thanks for the outpouring of love and support this year from our Tavern family. While this year has been challenging, we are truly blessed and grateful to be a part of this wonderful community. We wish everyone near and far a safe and healthy Thanksgiving. Thanksgiving At Flagler Tavern Call 386-402-8861 Ext 2 to order! We know this Thanksgiving will be different this year for so many of our friends out there who may not be able to travel to be with family and loved ones. We would like to help make your holiday special and stress free. We have several options for you to choose from this year for your Thanksgiving meal. Dine-In In addition, to our full menu we will be serving a full Thanksgiving meal along with our yummy specials in our dining rooms and on our deck for those of you looking to get out of the house and enjoy a safe and socially distanced environment. See our full menu below! Individual Meals To-Go All of our Thanksgiving Specials, in addition to our full menu, are also available to go for curbside pickup or delivery. Delivery is free with $25 minimum order in New Smyrna Beachside and west to US1 from the Library to Papas Plaza. For Larger orders outside our delivery area, please contact us! Individual meals include: Traditional Turkey Dinner: Herb roasted turkey, stuffing, mashed potatoes and gravy, cranberry sauce and green bean casserole. OR Spiral Cut Ham Dinner: Pineapple honey glazed spiral cut ham, grilled pineapple ring, mashed potatoes, stuffing and green beach casserole. Heat and Serve Family Meal For just $99 we have created a Heat and Serve Family Meal available for take out or delivery only. Designed to serve 4 to 6 people, it includes: Hand Carved Turkey Breast Seasoned Herb Stuffing Mashed Potatoes & Gravy Green Bean Casserole Yeast Rolls (6) Cranberry Sauce Add Ons: Autumn Salad (Serves 4 to 6) $23 Butternut Squash Bisque Pint- $10 / Quart-$18 Shrimp Cocktail Platter – $25 Traditional Deviled Egg Platter- $15 Hand Carved Turkey Breast – $17/per pound Green Bean Casserole- $20 Mashed Potatoes- $13 Yeast Rolls (6)- $5 Herb Seasoned Stuffing- $10 Gravy- Pint- $2.50 / Quart- $5.00 Cranberry Sauce- Pint-$4 Pumpkin Pie by the Slice $5 Pecan Pie by the Slice $5 Because we cook and carve each turkey in house, we ask that you place your order in advance, no later than Saturday, November 21st. Call 386-402-8861 Ext 2 to order! We are here to help. Review this page for a general list of office contact information. Office Hours and Locations A-Z Office Hours and Locations A-Z Academic Access and Success Hours Virtual and in-person assistance is available Monday through Friday 8 am-5 pm. Links to request an appointment with an advisor and to add or change a major or minor can be found on our Academic Advising page. Location Third Floor of Proctor Library Contact cace@flagler.edu Director Jill Dawson, Dean of Academic Access and Success Admissions Admissions Hours Monday-Friday: 8 a.m.-5 p.m. Location Hanke Hall 63 Cordova Street Contact Admissions: admissions@flagler.edu 904.819.6220 Directors Rachel Branch, Dean of Admissions Alumni Engagement Alumni Engagement Hours Monday-Friday: 8 a.m.-5 p.m. Location Alumni House 1st Floor 48 Sevilla Street Contact Alumni@flagler.edu Director Whitney Shafer, Senior Director of Alumni and College Relations Special Events Hours 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. Location Markland House, 105 King St. Contact 904-823-8617 or specialevents@flagler.edu Schedule an event on Saints Connect! Director : Stephanie Burgess ASL Lab and Tutoring American Sign Language (ASL) tutors are available to students who are taking any ASL courses at Flagler College. Please refer to the points below for more information: Tutoring hours can be found at this link: ASL Tutoring Hours To schedule a tutoring appointment, students must email Asllab@flagler.edu . Within this email, students should include their name, ASL Level, Professor's name, and preferred meeting time so that they may be assigned a tutor.  Students can also request tutoring via this link: Schedule a Tutoring Appointment Once your request has been reviewed by one of our lab assistants, you will receive an Outlook calendar invitation with the appointment time and the tutor you will be working with. Please note that you will not receive this email instantly, but if you haven’t received a follow-up email within 24 hours, please contact us again. Tutoring appointments can be conducted via Zoom, whereby.com [no login required] or in person. Therefore, we recommend that all students download For Whereby.com appointments, please use this: Whereby.com/FlaglerASL We request that both students and tutors join the meeting ~5 minutes prior to the tutoring appointment. Bookstore Hours Monday- Friday: 9 a.m.- 4 p.m. Saturday: 10 a.m. - 3 p.m. You can purchase or return books, and shop for all your official Flagler College gear and supplies via our online store: flagler.bncollege.com . Location 107 King St.  ( Google Map ) Go to the Bookstore Campus Excellence and Engagement Hours Monday-Friday: 9 a.m. - 5 p.m. Location Multicultural Center in the Ponce Breezeway Contact ocee@flagler.edu Director De Vondalyn Hughes Career Development Center Hours Monday-Friday: 8 a.m. - 5 p.m. During this time, we are developing online information virtual sessions and are available for face-to-face and virtual/phone meetings. Be sure to follow the Student Affairs weekly newsletter for a list of online activities. Location Alumni House-Anderson Cottage 2nd floor 48 Sevilla Street Contact careerdevelopment@flagler.edu Make an Appointment Director Vernita Bowens, Director of Career Development Center CARE Team Hours Monday-Friday: 8 a.m. - 5 p.m. Location Tinlin House 65 Valencia Street Contact Office: 904-819-6308 Care@flagler.edu Director Dr. Andrea Adams-Manning, Director of Case Management, Education and Outreach for Health & Wellness Mary Tinlin, Senior Director for Health & Wellness/CARE Coordinator Center for Global Education Hours Monday-Friday: 8 a.m. - 3 p.m. Remote Appointments Available Monday through Friday. Location Wiley Hall 6 Valencia St. Contact global@flagler.edu 904-819-6218 Counseling Services Hours Monday - Friday: 8 a.m.-4 p.m. Email counseling@flagler.edu June-August for a referral. Appointments will be scheduled by email ( counseling@flagler.edu ) and non-crisis appointments will take place via tele-therapy (Phone or Video). Please Note Our after-hours protocol is for students to contact Safety and Security at 904-819-6200. If you are experiencing a psychological emergency, call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room, which is at Flagler Hospital. Email us at support@flagler.edu For more information, please visit support.flagler.edu Learning Resource Center The Learning Resource Center (LRC) will be open and offering online tutoring for all subjects from now until the end of the term. Please note the following: Although now moved online, LRC hours and tutor availabilities are not changing. Students can make an appointment on the LRC page . Tutoring meetings will be held via Zoom, so students should proactively download and register for the program here: https://zoom.us/docs/ent/school-verification.html . Upon appointment booking, students will receive a confirmation email with further instructions. Tutors and students should plan to be online about five minutes before the conference begins. Tutors will email students a link to the Zoom meeting. A Wee Bio of our Larger Than Life Owner - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City A Wee Bio of our Larger Than Life Owner Posted on January 17, 2020 January 17, 2020 Flagler Tavern Owner, Theo Mundell The most important part of running a successful business (especially on Flagler Avenue) is your connection with your customers.  No one knows this better than our owners Theo, Sherman and Mike, here at Flagler Tavern. Every day of the week you can spot at least one, and often all three of our owners, on-site, chatting with customers, meeting with managers, staff and vendors, and examining the premise with an expert eye to making sure the Flagler Tavern maintains a level of maintenance, cleanliness and ambiance that is up to their expectations.  It’s their hands-on approach and attention to detail that has allowed the Flagler Tavern to grow and thrive under their stewardship without losing is small town charm. Which is why we were thrilled that the Flagler Avenue Business Association selected owner Theo Mundell to be among the handful of Flagler Avenue business owners to represent the Avenue for the launch of it’s new “Meet Me on Flagler Ave” campaign. Take a peek at the great video they shot of Theo recently. Although it’s often heard…”I know Theo”, you might learn a thing or two about our charismatic owner who is larger than life in the “wee bio” that accompanies the video at https://flaglerave.com/merchants/theo-mundell/ . The next time you are on Flagler Avenue, stop by Flagler Tavern, make sure to give a wave to Theo and perhaps join him in a “wee” Baby Guinness! The Bounty - Flagler Tavern Skip to content 414 Flagler Avenue New Smyrna Beach, FL 32169 (386) 402-8861 info@flaglertavern.com Open Today Today's Bounty Hours Toggle navigation About About Us Happy Hour Shop Now Contact Us Areas Tavern Main Bar The Indigo Bar The Outside Decks The Bounty Menu Tavern Menu Bounty Menu Order Online Entertainment Calendar Flagler Tavern The Bounty Private Events Shop Tempature City Mon-Thurs 4:00PM-10:00PM Fri 4:00PM-2:00AM Saturday 10:00am-2:00am Sunday 10:00AM-10:00PM Bounty Happy Hour Monday-Friday 4:00PM-7:00PM $1 Off All Beverages | $5 off Wine Bottles Saturday & Sunday 3:00PM-7:00pm 20% off all beverages | Anchor Club Members Only Monday-Thursday 9:00PM-CLOSE Double Points on all beverages for Anchor Club Club Members A unique speakeasy located upstairs with a full bar, dining area and deck overlooking Flagler Avenue The decor pays homage to our nautical roots from the 1900s–1920s. We've repurposed parts of the original Flagler Tavern building within the newly renovated upstairs area. The result is an eclectic mix of vintage, nautical-inspired decor. The Bounty offers a more intimate setting for guests who want to escape the noise and bustle of nightlife below. It’s ideal for a private, high-end dining experience or cocktails with friends. Escape upstairs to the speakeasy! The front deck offers amazing views of the ocean and Flagler Avenue, along with a separate bar called the "Wee Bait Shack," serving beer and cocktails. Continue Reading Read More Posts An Inside Look At The Bounty A Unique Speakeasy bar at the flagler tavern Made-From-Scratch Cocktails ​A truly unique space, the Bounty Bar on Flagler Tavern’s upper level exudes a nautical steampunk ambience. A cozy, intimate setting with plush leather chairs and soft lighting provides a respite from the high-energy scene on the downstairs level. An exclusive cocktail menu features premium made-from-scratch creations that can only be found at the Bounty Bar, including our famous ‘smoked maple old fashioned.’ Choose from a distinctive selection of liquors and homemade infusions, or sip a glass of wine from our impressive assortment of top quality vintages. one-of-a-kind experience ​Hand-rolled cigars and gourmet coffee drinks are available for your indulgence - contributing to a one-of-a-kind experience. The Bounty Bar now offers a tapas menu served daily from noon to 11pm. We invite you to join us for a delicious culinary experience.
